title: BRIEF-India's JSW Steel Exec Says Inventory Level 14 Mln Tonnes
text:
BRIEF-India's JSW Steel Exec Says Inventory Level 14 Mln Tonnes

Stock Markets 9 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 14:01)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's JSW Steel Exec Says Inventory Level 14 Mln Tonnes Sept 23 (Reuters) - JSW Steel (NS: ) Ltd, JOINT MD, SESHAGIRI RAO SAYS * INVENTORY LEVEL 14 MILLION TONNES * CORP TAX CUT, FAVOURABLE MONSOON TO BRING DEMAND REVIVAL IN SECOND HALF * EFFECTIVE TAX RATE COMING DOWN TO 25.17% POST CORPORATE TAX CUT * INDUSTRY SEEKING 25% SAFEGUARD DUTY ON ALL STEEL PRODUCTS * CAPEX PLAN OF 157 BILLION RUPEES ON TRACK IN FY20 * SAYS STEEL PRICES STABILISED, DON'T EXPECT DOWNSIDE IN SECOND HALF Further company coverage: JSTL.NS

BRIEF-India's JSW Steel Exec Says Inventory Level 14 Mln Tonnes
description: BRIEF-India's JSW Steel Exec Says Inventory Level 14 Mln Tonnes
